BabyNamingTitle: What should we name our child?
Crib_Empty: Grandpa would want you to have another kid.
Crib_Empty_EnoughKids: Grandpa would say you have more than enough kids.
Adoption_Prompt: Welcome to the adoption registry! You can sign up to adopt a child here, regardless of whether you are married.
Adoption_CantAdoptYet_BiggerHouse: You'll need a bigger house before you can adopt.
Adoption_CantAdoptYet_NoCrib: You'll need a crib before you can adopt a baby.
